Master Answer:
Contact your local health unit to book an immunization appointment for your son to receive his second dose of measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine and varicella (chickenpox) vaccine. Use the health unit finder. Bring your son's immunization records to the appointment.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: We moved from Alberta to BC since 2010 and my son currently 11 yrs old. According to his record, he only received MMR and Varicella 1 time and I would like to book appointment.
Master Question variation 0: varicella & mmr what is the difference
Master Question variation 1: can varicella be replaced with mmr
Master Question variation 2: what varicella does varicella come with
